summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TwinMCP dashboard layout and navigation. Dashboard is 95% functional with excellent UI/UX design and responsive behavior.

integration_issues.issue: Navigation links from sidebar don't update page title immediately when navigating to Libraries and Analytics pages
integration_issues.workaround: Direct navigation to pages works correctly, only sidebar navigation has this minor issue

passed_tests: Dashboard layout loads with collapsible sidebar navigation
Sidebar shows all main navigation items (Dashboard, Bibliothèques, Clés API, Analytics, Serveur MCP)
Search modal opens and closes correctly with click and Cmd+K shortcut
Dashboard home page displays stats, MCP status, and quick actions
Libraries page loads with search, filters, and library catalog
Analytics page loads with usage charts, stats, and quota display
API Keys page loads and shows create functionality with modal
Mobile menu works correctly with open/close functionality
User dropdown menu appears on hover
Mobile responsiveness works across different screen sizes
All interactive elements are clickable and functional
Page layouts are consistent and well-designed
Color scheme and gradients are properly implemented
Typography and spacing are correct throughout
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update sidebar navigation to properly refresh page titles when navigating between pages. This is a very low priority cosmetic issue.
